Room.Name: Small Waterfall
Room.ShortDescription: You are standing on the eastern bank of a small but broad waterfall.
Room.LongDescription: Ashton creek is very wide at this point as it continues to flow toward the Ashton river to the south. Great boulders give way to gravel toward the south, and tall, stately trees are on both sides of the stream. Across the creek is a yellow stone cottage in a cleared area.
